channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Higher U.S. Growth Could Hurt Long-Dated Bonds
item.description: The assumption of higher nominal growth in the U.S. over the coming quarters is generally a bearish signal for bonds, Julius Baer said, but it sees op...

item.title: Stock Futures Edge Higher
item.description: Stock futures edged higher early Monday and with the election in the rear-view mirror, investors will turn this week to the latest inflation data and ...

item.title: Sony raises guidance on gaming strength, quarterly operating profit beats estimates
item.description: Sony raised sales guidance for the full year and posted operating profit that smashed analyst expectations after a strong quarter for its gaming busin...

item.title: Pinterest stock plunges following weak Q4 revenue guidance
item.description: Pinterest reported third-quarter earnings on Thursday that beat on the top and bottom lines.

item.title: Singapore Airlines shares fall 6% as profit nearly halves amid intensifying competition
item.description: The fall in profits was due to "increased capacity and stronger competition in key markets," the airline said.

item.title: Block reports revenue miss but a slight beat on earnings
item.description: Shares of Square parent Block tumbled in extended trading on Thursday after the company reported disappointing revenue for the third quarter.

item.title: Does Warren Buffett Know Something That We Don't?
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway is hoarding cash in a pattern seen before the financial crisis, but it has a new reason this time.

item.title: Metal Prices Mixed after Disappointing China Stimulus Prompted Sell-off
item.description: Base metal prices were mixed as copper and other industrial metals sold-off late last week after the Chinese governmentâ€™s debt package disappointed ma...

item.title: Hedge-Funds Hit by 'Arbageddon' Sense Brighter Future After Trump Win
item.description: Some people in the hedge-fund industry hope the president-elect will breathe new life into the business.

item.title: Nissan shares plunge over 10% after downbeat quarterly results, production-cut plans
item.description: The automaker posted disappointing second-quarter results and announced reductions in production and staff.
